Detailed Description

This file contains implementation of the test cases for pyproto.

Version:
0.1

Function Documentation

char* cut_file_from_path ( char *  path  ) 

Extract the a filename from path. Add ".py" ending if the file does not contain one.

Parameters:
path absolute or relative path to file

char* cutname ( char *  file  ) 

Remove the .py ending from filename

Returns:
new string with the .py ending stripped

LOCAL char * fetch_title ( char *  input  ) 

holds original value of PYTHONPATH variable it will be read during module start and restored when module is unloaded

Function used to fetch title of testcase from python's function's docstring

Parameters:
input docstring extracted from python script
Returns:
extracted title - it is allocated inside the function, so it is mandatory to free it afterwards to prevent memory leak

void tm_finalize (  ) 

Deinitiliaze python module, called by TMC

int tm_get_test_cases ( const char *  cfg_file,
DLList **  cases 
)

tm_get_test_cases is used to inquire test cases from the Test Module. Test cases are stored to array of test cases. The Test Framework will be the owner of the data in the DLList after tm_get_test_cases return and it does the memory deallocation.

void tm_initialize (  ) 

Initiliaze python module, called by TMC
